author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...GABRIELLE EXPECTED TO BECOME A HURRICANE TONIGHT OR ON SUNDAY... ...EXPECTED TO PASS EAST OF BERMUDA SUNDAY NIGHT OR MONDAY...
summary: ...GABRIELLE EXPECTED TO BECOME A HURRICANE TONIGHT OR ON SUNDAY... ...EXPECTED TO PASS EAST OF BERMUDA SUNDAY NIGHT OR MONDAY... As of 5:00 PM AST Sat Sep 20 the center of Gabrielle was located near 25.6, -59.0 with movement NW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 996 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...GABRIELLE EXPECTED TO BECOME A HURRICANE TONIGHT OR ON SUNDAY... ...EXPECTED TO PASS EAST OF BERMUDA SUNDAY NIGHT OR MONDAY... As of 5:00 PM AST Sat Sep 20 the center of Gabrielle was located near 25.6, -59.0 with movement NW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 996 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Gabrielle (AT2/AL072025)
